Text:
Was looking everywhere for a mini sized version of this but this version has too many artifacts for my liking.

KGN if you're the one who encoded this, here's a hint: Don't use the AAC LC profile to encode small sized anime! The bloated audio file accounted for half the filesize here, resulting in badly bit starved video. Only use HE or Vorbis!
Thanks for advice i will keep it in mind for future encodes.
